Text (FINAL): The Wellings and the Papers That Wouldn’t Stay Put
They were meant to stay in one place.
But papers do not always listen.
Mr. Welling tried to catch them.
Some went to places they had never been.
The pet did not chase any.
“Should we stop them?” asked Mr. Welling.
But the papers had already gone.
Some things are meant to move.
Not everything stays where we put it. That doesn’t mean it’s gone.
